meanings.definition: Given the authority to act on behalf of someone else.
meanings.sent1: The deputised nurse made decisions in place of the doctor.
meanings.sent2: The deputised driver was allowed to sign documents on behalf of the company.
meanings.sent3: The deputised teddy bear tried to negotiate with the other toys in the playroom.
meanings.sent4: The deputised key unlocked the mystery box of treasures.
meanings.sent5: The deputised superhero saved the day in the absence of the main hero.
